sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-buttons slot="start">
      <ion-menu-button></ion-menu-button>
      <ion-title>Crear cita</ion-title>
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content>
  <ion-list lines="full">

      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Paciente</ion-label>
        <ion-input [(ngModel)]="datos.paciente"  type="text" required></ion-input>
      </ion-item>
      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Correo</ion-label>
        <ion-input [(ngModel)]="datos.correo" type="text" required>
        </ion-input>
      </ion-item>
      <ion-item>
        <ion-label position="floating">Celular</ion-label>
        <ion-input [(ngModel)]="datos.celular" type="text" required>
        </ion-input>
      </ion-item>
      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="primary" shape="full" expand="block" (click)="saveCita()">Agendar Cita</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="danger" shape="full" expand="block" routerLink="/doctores">Cancelar</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      
  </ion-list>
</ion-content>
